item.title: Editors' Newswire for 12 April, 2002
item.description: Newswire stories, including: WSIO goes RAND?.

item.title: Revised DOM Level 3 drafts
item.description: The W3C has released new draft of Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Abstract Schemas and Load and Save Specification and Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Core Specification.

item.description: Newswire stories, including: Second edition of Ken Holman's XSL-FO materials available; RDF Core Working Group to register application/rdf+xml.
